mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM prepay_info pri,pay_info pi,pay_order_wx pow

SELECT pri.PREPAY_INFO_ID AS prepayInfoId, pri.APP_TRADE_NO AS appTradeNo, pri.APP_ID AS preAppId, pri.CREATE_TIME AS prepayCreateTime, pri.AMOUNT AS amount, pri.APP_IP AS appIp, pow.PAY_INFO_ID AS payInfoId, pi.PAY_AMOUNT AS payAmount, pi.CHANNEL AS channel, pi.PAY_CHANNEL_ORDER_ID AS payChannelOrderId, pi.PAY_DETAIL_ID AS payDetailId, pi.BIZ_TYPE AS bizType, pi.BIZ_ID AS bizId, pi.PAY_SUCCESS_NOTIFIED_TIMES AS paySuccessNotifiedTimes, pi.STATUS AS status, pi.STATUS_HISTORY AS statusHistory, pi.TIME_START AS payTimeStart, pi.TIME_EXPIRE AS payTimeExpire, pi.REFUND_STATUS AS refundStatus, pi.REFUNDED_PRICE AS refundedPrice, pi.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, pi.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, pi.PAY_SUCCESS_TIME AS paySuccessTime, pi.REFUND_APPLY_TIME AS refundApplyTime, pi.REFUND_SUCCESS_TIME AS refundSuccessTime, pi.QUERY_TIME AS queryTime, pow.PAY_ORDER_WX_ID AS payOrderWxId, pow.APPID AS appid, pow.MCH_ID AS mchId, pow.DEVICE_INFO AS deviceInfo, pow.BODY AS body, pow.DETAIL AS detail, pow.ATTACH AS attach, pow.FEE_TYPE AS feeType, pow.TOTAL_FEE AS totalFee, pow.SPBILL_CREATE_IP AS spbillCreateIp, pow.TIME_START AS timeStart, pow.TIME_EXPIRE AS timeExpire, pow.GOODS_TAG AS goodsTag, pow.TRADE_TYPE AS tradeType, pow.PRODUCT_ID AS productId, pow.LIMIT_PAY AS limitPay, pow.OPENID AS openid, pow.PREPAY_ID AS prepayId, pow.CODE_URL AS codeUrl, pow.PREPAY_RESULT_CODE AS prepayResultCode, pow.PAY_TRANSACTION_ID AS payTransactionId, pow.PAY_RESULT_CODE AS payResultCode, pow.BANK_TYPE AS bankType, pow.SETTLEMENT_TOTAL_FEE AS settlementTotalFee, pow.CASH_FEE AS cashFee, pow.CASH_FEE_TYPE AS cashFeeType, pow.COUPON_FEE AS couponFee, pow.COUPON_COUNT AS couponCount, pow.COUPON_DETAIL_LIST AS couponDetailList, pow.TIME_END AS timeEnd, pow.IS_VALID AS isValid FROM prepay_info pri, pay_info pi, pay_order_wx pow
